mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", sg.name AS "goods.name", sg.price AS "goods.price", a.order_id AS "order.id", a.comment AS "comment", a.reply AS "reply", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN s_goods sg ON sg.id=a.goods_id LEFT JOIN s_order so ON so.id=a.order_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_goods_comment( id, goods_id, order_id, comment, reply, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goods.id}, #{order.id}, #{comment}, #{reply}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_goods_comment SET goods_id = #{goods.id}, order_id = #{order.id}, comment = #{comment}, reply = #{reply}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
